channel.title: Vampire Vs. Werewolf
channel.description:
CHUCK NORRIS IS A WEREPIRE!!! YOU BITCHES! SO HE CAN'T DO SHIT!
I would prefer vampire.
Here's some facts about vampires and werewolves before you all start shoving your ideas down my throat.
Vampires: You can only be in the dark. Mortal enemies of the werewolves. If you we're to transform someone. You can't be stupid. (just dont kill them. bite them, jackass) You hunger for blood. In order to not turn someone into a vampire. You bite off their heads. You can only turn a were wolf into a werepire. Simple. Because the curse can't be overrun by another curse. So they coexist. And to do this a werewolf in his human form would need to enter a dark place and get bitten. Garlic weakens you. You can eat garlic bread from fast food restaurants. It won't hurt you (for io9). A wooden stake through the heart can kill you. Or, someone blowing your mother fucking head off. Bullets dont hurt you, if they hit you anywhere but the head. You can kill a werewolf by shooting that mother fucker. You can't get a boner. You're strong and fast, but not smart enough to hide. You can just run.
Werewolf: Your you can't controll what you do as a werewolf, you don't remember. Silver bullet can kill you. But to make it fair. It needs to hit you in the heart. If you manage to control your curse (by that I don't mean turn it on and off. i mean control yourself while in werewolf form) you will kick ass. You can kill a vampire by tearing them to shreds. You can be weakened by bullets anywhere besides the heart. And as always, lose your head, you die. You have super regeneration, to heal from bullets. You have a small penis. You are strong, you can run, and hide. You can turn a vampire into a werepire by biting them.
Werepire: one thing really. you have all the attributes of a vampire and werewolf. you're only in this form during a fullmoon. you're a human with sensitive skin when not in werepire form.
Who would win (not including werepires), and who would you chose to be. Why?

item.title: Vampire Vs. Werewolf
item.dc:creator: @JukuG JukuG
item.description:
@JukuG wrote:

I believe during a full moon when the infected person transforms into a werewolf he would beat the vampire. However, what makes this a hard decision is the fact that the werewolf is literally under the affect of rabies, meaning that he would be slashing, biting, etc… uncontrollably.

Plus, it would suck to be either of those imo.

Read full topic

item.title: Vampire Vs. Werewolf
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:12, topic:237438”][quote author=cooper link=topic=313496.msg2495921#msg2495921 date=1224395249]
I don’t understand, why is that racist?
Vampires are supposedly already dead and ageless, only dying from certain things [holy water, silver bullet, stake through heart, sunlight, etc], while lycanthropes are human when not in animal form - easily killed - and they cannot control their transformations, so if they get caught as a human they’re dead.
[/quote]
It’s called stealth my friend.

EDIT: Ok, this is just a stupid attempt to defend my vote
But you realize this shit isn’t real? If not, call 911 ;)[/quote]
Of course I realize that

Read full topic
